ActuatorDeviationWarning.Description: Detected valve actuator position is different than desired control position.
ActuatorDeviationWarning.Resolution: Inspect valve actuators for proper operation.

ActuatorDeviationWarningCleared.Description: Detected valve actuator position is no longer different than desired control position.

BackupAC3PhFault.Description: Backup 3 phase AC power supply alarm
BackupAC3PhFault.Resolution: Check backup AC power supply to CDU.

BackupACOffT2Or24VACFault.Description: Fault indicates either the backup AC power supply is off, an issue with transformer 2, or an issue with the backup 24 VAC supply.
BackupACOffT2Or24VACFault.Message: Backup AC power supply off, transformer 2, or backup 24 VAC fault alarm.
BackupACOffT2Or24VACFault.Resolution: Check backup AC power supply to CDU.

BackupACOffT2Or24VACFaultCleared.Description: Fault cleared that indicated either the backup AC power supply was off, an issue with transformer 2, or an issue with the backup 24 VAC supply..
BackupACOffT2Or24VACFaultCleared.Message: Backup AC power supply off, transformer 2, or backup 24 VAC fault alarm cleared.

DualHighDewPointAlarm.Description: Dew point is near coolant temperature. Coolant temperature control mode changed to avoid condensation.
DualHighDewPointAlarm.Resolution: Take actions to reduce humidity near cabinets

DualHighDewPointAlarmCleared.Description: Dew point is no longer near coolant temperature. Coolant temperature control mode returned to normal operation.
DualHighDewPointAlarmCleared.Message: Dual High dew point alarm cleared

EU3PS1BPressureProbeAlarm.Description: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1B is in a failed or disconnected state.
EU3PS1BPressureProbeAlarm.Message: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1B failure (Exp Universal IO 3)
EU3PS1BPressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

EU3PS1BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1B is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
EU3PS1BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1B failure cleared.

EU4PS4BPressureProbeAlarm.Description: Process return pressure probe PS4B is in a failed or disconnected state.
EU4PS4BPressureProbeAlarm.Message: Process return pressure probe PS4B failure (Exp Universal IO 4)
EU4PS4BPressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

EU4PS4BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Process return pressure probe PS4B is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
EU4PS4BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Process return pressure probe PS4B failure cleared.

EU5PS2BPressureAlarm.Description: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2B is in a failed or disconnected state.
EU5PS2BPressureAlarm.Message: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2B failure (Exp Universal IO 5)
EU5PS2BPressureAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

EU5PS2BPressureAlarmCleared.Description: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2B is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
EU5PS2BPressureAlarmCleared.Message: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2B failure cleared.

EU6PS4APressureAlarm.Description: Process return pressure probe PS4A is in a failed or disconnected state.
EU6PS4APressureAlarm.Message: Process return pressure probe PS4A failure (Exp Universal IO 4).
EU6PS4APressureAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

EU6PS4APressureAlarmCleared.Description: Process return pressure probe PS4A is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
EU6PS4APressureAlarmCleared.Message: Process return pressure probe PS4A failure cleared.

EU9T1BTemperatureProbeAlarm.Description: Supply temperature probe T1B is in a failed or disconnected state.
EU9T1BTemperatureProbeAlarm.Message: Supply temperature probe T1B failure (Exp Universal IO 9)
EU9T1BTemperatureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

EU9T1BTemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Supply temperature probe T1B is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
EU9T1BTemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Supply temperature probe T1B failure cleared.

EWSButtonActiveAlarm.Description: An Emergency Water Shutoff (EWS) button has been pressed, causing valves to close.
EWSButtonActiveAlarm.Resolution: Check both EWS buttons on front and back of cabinet.

EWSButtonActiveAlarmCleared.Description: An Emergency Water Shutoff (EWS) button is no longer pressed
EWSButtonActiveAlarmCleared.Message: Emergency Water Shutoff (EWS) button no longer pressed.

ExpBoardProbeAlarm.Description: One or more probes on the expansion board are indicating an alarm condition.
ExpBoardProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check for additional active alarms. Check CDU panel.

ExpBoardProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Expansion board probes are no longer indicating an alarm condition.

GeneralAlarm.Description: Indicates the general CDU alarm triggered.
GeneralAlarm.Resolution: Check for other active alarms. Check CDU Panel.

GeneralAlarmCleared.Description: Indicates the general CDU alarm cleared.

HighDewPointAlarm.Description: Dew point is near coolant temperature. Coolant temperature control mode changed to avoid condensation.
HighDewPointAlarm.Resolution: Take actions to reduce humidity near cabinets

HighDewPointAlarmCleared.Description: Dew point is no longer near coolant temperature. Coolant temperature control mode returned to normal operation.

HighDewPointWarning.Description: Dew point is approaching coolant temperature.
HighDewPointWarning.Resolution: Eliminate sources of humidity near cabinets.

HighDewPointWarningCleared.Description: Dew point is no longer approaching coolant temperature.

HighFilterDpAlarm.Description: Sensors detect a high change in pressure across the coolant filter.
HighFilterDpAlarm.Resolution: Check coolant filter. Clean or replace as needed.

HighFilterDpAlarmCleared.Description: Sensors no longer detect a high change in pressure across the coolant filter.
HighFilterDpAlarmCleared.Message: High Filter Differential Pressure Alarm cleared

HighHxpInTempAlarm.Description: High coolant temperature detected on the primary side of the heat exchanger in the coolant supplied to the CDU.
HighHxpInTempAlarm.Message: Heat exchanger primary side high temperature alarm.
HighHxpInTempAlarm.Resolution: Check primary coolant temperature and flow. Check valve position.

HighHxpInTempAlarmCleared.Description: High coolant temperature no longer detected on the primary side of the heat exchanger in the coolant supplied to the CDU.
HighHxpInTempAlarmCleared.Message: Heat exchanger primary side high temperature alarm cleared

HighHxsTemperatureAlarm.Description: High coolant temperature detected on the secondary side of the heat exchanger.
HighHxsTemperatureAlarm.Message: Heat exchanger secondary side high temperature alarm.
HighHxsTemperatureAlarm.Resolution: Check primary HX inlet temp, cooling valve actuator position, pressures in both primary and secondary loop.

HighHxsTemperatureAlarmCleared.Description: High coolant temperature no longer detected on the secondary side of the heat exchanger.
HighHxsTemperatureAlarmCleared.Message: Heat exchanger secondary side high temperature alarm cleared

HighPressureShutdownAlarm.Description: High coolant pressure has triggered a system shutdown.
HighPressureShutdownAlarm.Resolution: Check secondary side pressure sensors. Check for pump deadhead. Check expansion tank.

HighPressureShutdownAlarmCleared.Description: High coolant pressure no longer detected.

HighProcessInTempAlarm.Description: Temperature of the supplied process coolant is higher than the alarm setpoint.
HighProcessInTempAlarm.Message: High process coolant inlet temperature alarm.
HighProcessInTempAlarm.Resolution: Check supplied chilled coolant temperature and flow.

HighProcessInTempAlarmCleared.Description: Temperature of the supplied process coolant is no longer higher than the alarm setpoint.
HighProcessInTempAlarmCleared.Message: High process coolant inlet temperature alarm cleared.

LeakSensor1Alarm.Description: The presence of water is detected by sensor 1.
LeakSensor1Alarm.Resolution: Check for leak or open circuit to leak sensor 1.

LeakSensor2Alarm.Description: The presence of water is detected by sensor 2.
LeakSensor2Alarm.Resolution: Check for leak or open circuit to leak sensor 2.

LowFlowP1Alarm.Description: Low coolant flow alarm 1 indicated by pressure sensors.
LowFlowP1Alarm.Resolution: Check coolant level, pressure values, and pump operation at CDU panel.

LowFlowP1AlarmCleared.Description: Low coolant flow alarm 1 no longer indicated by pressure sensors.

LowFlowP2Alarm.Description: Low coolant flow alarm 2 indicated by pressure sensors.
LowFlowP2Alarm.Resolution: Check coolant level, pressure values, and pump operation at CDU panel.

LowFlowP2AlarmCleared.Description: Low coolant flow alarm 2 no longer indicated by pressure sensors.

LowHxsTemperatureAlarm.Description: Low coolant temperature detected on the secondary side of the heat exchanger.
LowHxsTemperatureAlarm.Message: Heat exchanger secondary side low temperature alarm.
LowHxsTemperatureAlarm.Resolution: Check actuator value position. Check probe accuracy.

LowHxsTemperatureAlarmCleared.Description: Low coolant temperature detected on the secondary side of the heat exchanger.
LowHxsTemperatureAlarmCleared.Message: Heat exchanger secondary side low temperature alarm cleared

LowProcessInTempAlarm.Description: Temperature of the supplied process coolant is lower than the alarm setpoint.
LowProcessInTempAlarm.Message: Low process coolant inlet temperature alarm.
LowProcessInTempAlarm.Resolution: Check supplied chilled coolant temperature and flow.

LowProcessInTempAlarmCleared.Description: Temperature of the supplied process coolant is no longer lower than the alarm setpoint.
LowProcessInTempAlarmCleared.Message: Low process coolant inlet temperature alarm cleared.

LowSuctionPressureAlarm.Description: One or more pump inlet pressure sensors indicate low suction pressure conditions.
LowSuctionPressureAlarm.Resolution: Check for loss or pressure, leak, or air in system. Check for closed suction isolation valve.

LowSuctionPressureAlarmCleared.Description: Pump inlet pressure sensors no longer indicate low suction pressure conditions.
LowSuctionPressureAlarmCleared.Message: Low pump suction pressure alarm cleared

LowSystemPressureAlarm.Resolution: Check status of Cooling coolant supply system.

Main115VACLossAlarm.Description: Power loss alarm for the main 125 VAC power source.
Main115VACLossAlarm.Resolution: Check main AC power supply to CDU.

Main115VACLossAlarmCleared.Description: Power loss alarm cleared for the main 125 VAC power source.
Main115VACLossAlarmCleared.Message: Main power 115 VAC loss alarm cleared

Main24VACLossAlarm.Description: Power loss alarm for the main 24 VAC power source.
Main24VACLossAlarm.Resolution: Check for loss of main 115 VAC supply. Check main transformer.

Main24VACLossAlarmCleared.Description: Power loss alarm cleared for the main 24 VAC power source.
Main24VACLossAlarmCleared.Message: Main 24 VAC power loss alarm cleared.

MainACOffOrT1FaultAlarm.Description: Fault indicates either the main AC power supply is off or an issue with transformer 1.
MainACOffOrT1FaultAlarm.Message: Main AC power supply off or transformer 1 fault alarm.
MainACOffOrT1FaultAlarm.Resolution: Check main AC power supply to CDU.

MainACOffOrT1FaultAlarmCleared.Description: Fault cleared that indicated either the main AC power supply is off or an issue with transformer 1.
MainACOffOrT1FaultAlarmCleared.Message: Main AC power supply off or transformer 1 fault alarm cleared.

RTCClockBoardAlarm.Description: Issue detected on real time clock board.

RTCClockBoardAlarmCleared.Description: Issue cleared on real time clock board.
RTCClockBoardAlarmCleared.Message: Real time clock board alarm cleared

RhHumidityProbe1Alarm.Description: Humidity probe on relative humidity board 1 is in a failed or disconnected state.
RhHumidityProbe1Alarm.Message: Relative humidity board 1 humidity probe failure.
RhHumidityProbe1Alarm.Resolution: Check probe wiring and connections. Replace sensor unit if necessary.

RhHumidityProbe1AlarmCleared.Description: Humidity probe on relative humidity board 1 no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
RhHumidityProbe1AlarmCleared.Message: Relative humidity board 1 humidity probe failure cleared.

RhHumidityProbe2Alarm.Description: Humidity probe on relative humidity board 2 is in a failed or disconnected state.
RhHumidityProbe2Alarm.Message: Relative humidity board 2 humidity probe failure.
RhHumidityProbe2Alarm.Resolution: Check probe wiring and connections. Replace sensor unit if necessary.

RhHumidityProbe2AlarmCleared.Description: Humidity probe on relative humidity board 2 no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
RhHumidityProbe2AlarmCleared.Message: Relative humidity board 2 humidity probe failure cleared

RhTemperatureProbe1Alarm.Description: Temperature probe on relative humidity board 1 is in a failed or disconnected state.
RhTemperatureProbe1Alarm.Message: Relative humidity board 1 temperature probe failure.
RhTemperatureProbe1Alarm.Resolution: Check probe wiring and connections. Replace sensor unit if necessary.

RhTemperatureProbe1AlarmCleared.Description: Temperature probe on relative humidity board 1 no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
RhTemperatureProbe1AlarmCleared.Message: Relative humidity board 1 temperature probe failure cleared

RhTemperatureProbe2Alarm.Description: Temperature probe on relative humidity board 2 is in a failed or disconnected state.
RhTemperatureProbe2Alarm.Message: Relative humidity board 2 temperature probe failure.
RhTemperatureProbe2Alarm.Resolution: Check probe wiring and connections. Replace sensor unit if necessary.

RhTemperatureProbe2AlarmCleared.Description: Temperature probe on relative humidity board 2 no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
RhTemperatureProbe2AlarmCleared.Message: Relative humidity board 2 temperature probe failure cleared

U10PS2APressureProbeAlarm.Description: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2A is in a failed or disconnected state.
U10PS2APressureProbeAlarm.Message: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2A failure (Universal IO 10).
U10PS2APressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U10PS2APressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2A is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U10PS2APressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Filter outlet pressure probe PS2A failure cleared.

U10SSP2PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Pressure probe 2 on the secondary side pump inlet is in a failed or disconnected state.
U10SSP2PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side pump inlet pressure probe 2 (SSP2) failed (Universal IO 10)
U10SSP2PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U10SSP2PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Pressure probe 2 on the secondary side pump inlet no longer is in a failed or disconnected state.
U10SSP2PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side pump inlet pressure probe 2 (SSP2) alarm cleared

U1PS3APressureProbeAlarm.Description: Process supply pressure probe PS3A is in a failed or disconnected state.
U1PS3APressureProbeAlarm.Message: Process supply pressure probe PS3A failure (Universal IO 1).
U1PS3APressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U1PS3APressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Process supply pressure probe PS3A is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U1PS3APressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Process supply pressure probe PS3A failure cleared.

U1SPS1PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Pressure probe 1 on the secondary side coolant supply line is in a failed or disconnected state.
U1SPS1PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side coolant supply pressure probe 1 (SPS1) failed (Universal IO 1)
U1SPS1PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U1SPS1PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Pressure probe 1 on the secondary side coolant supply line no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U1SPS1PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side coolant supply pressure probe 1 (SPS1) alarm cleared

U2PS5PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Cooling water return pressure probe PS5 is in a failed or disconnected state.
U2PS5PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Cooling water return pressure probe PS5 failure (Universal IO 2).
U2PS5PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U2PS5PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Cooling water return pressure probe PS5 is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U2PS5PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Cooling water return pressure probe PS5 failure cleared.

U2SSP1PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Pressure probe 1 on the secondary side pump inlet is in a failed or disconnected state.
U2SSP1PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side pump inlet pressure probe 1 (SSP1) failed (Universal IO 2)
U2SSP1PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U2SSP1PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Pressure probe 1 on the secondary side pump inlet no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U2SSP1PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side coolant supply pressure probe 1 (SSP1) alarm cleared

U3PS6PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Cooling water supply pressure probe PS6 is in a failed or disconnected state.
U3PS6PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Cooling water supply pressure probe PS6 failure (Universal IO 3).
U3PS6PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U3PS6PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Cooling water supply pressure probe PS6 is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U3PS6PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Cooling water supply pressure probe PS6 failure cleared.

U3SST1TemperatureProbeAlarm.Description: Temperature probe 1 on the secondary side coolant supply line is in a failed or disconnected state.
U3SST1TemperatureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side coolant supply temperature probe 1 (SST1) failed (Universal IO 3).
U3SST1TemperatureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U3SST1TemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Temperature probe 1 on the secondary side coolant supply line no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U3SST1TemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side coolant supply temperature probe 1 (SST1) alarm cleared

U3T1ATemperatureProbeAlarm.Description: Supply temperature probe T1A is in a failed or disconnected state.
U3T1ATemperatureProbeAlarm.Message: Supply temperature probe T1A failure (Universal IO 3)
U3T1ATemperatureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U3T1ATemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Supply temperature probe T1A is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U3T1ATemperatureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Supply Temperature probe T1A failure cleared.

U6ProbePS1AAlarm.Description: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1A is in a failed or disconnected state.
U6ProbePS1AAlarm.Message: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1A failure (Universal IO 6).
U6ProbePS1AAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U6ProbePS1AAlarmCleared.Description: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1A is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U6ProbePS1AAlarmCleared.Message: Filter inlet pressure probe PS1A failure cleared.

U6SSFPressureProbeAlarm.Description: Pressure probe for the supply side filter is in a failed or disconnected state.
U6SSFPressureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side filter pressure probe (SSF) failed (Universal IO 6).
U6SSFPressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U6SSFPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Pressure probe for the supply side filter no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U6SSFPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side filter pressure probe (SSF) alarm cleared

U9PS3BPressureProbeAlarm.Description: Process supply pressure probe PS3B is in a failed or disconnected state.
U9PS3BPressureProbeAlarm.Message: Process supply pressure probe PS3B failure (Universal IO 9).
U9PS3BPressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U9PS3BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Process supply pressure probe PS3B is no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U9PS3BPressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Process supply pressure probe PS3B failure cleared.

U9SPS2PressureProbeAlarm.Description: Pressure probe 2 on the secondary side coolant supply line is in a failed or disconnected state.
U9SPS2PressureProbeAlarm.Message: Secondary side coolant supply pressure probe 2 (SPS2) failed (Universal IO 9)
U9SPS2PressureProbeAlarm.Resolution: Check wiring connection at PLC or sensor. Replace probe if necessary.

U9SPS2PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Description: Pressure probe 2 on the secondary side coolant supply line no longer in a failed or disconnected state.
U9SPS2PressureProbeAlarmCleared.Message: Secondary side coolant supply pressure probe 2 (SPS2) alarm cleared

VFD1AlarmMB.Description: One or more alarms active on Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).

VFD1AlarmMBCleared.Description: Alarms cleared on Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).
VFD1AlarmMBCleared.Message: Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) alarm cleared

VFD2AlarmMB.Description: One or more alarms active on Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).

VFD2AlarmMBCleared.Description: Alarms cleared on Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).
VFD2AlarmMBCleared.Message: Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) alarm cleared

VFDPump1FaultAlarm.Description: A fault from the Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) has triggered an alarm state.
VFDPump1FaultAlarm.Message: Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) fault alarm.

VFDPump1FaultAlarmCleared.Description: The fault cleared from the Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).
VFDPump1FaultAlarmCleared.Message: Pump 1 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) fault alarm cleared

VFDPump2FaultAlarm.Description: A fault from the Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) has triggered an alarm state.
VFDPump2FaultAlarm.Message: Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) fault alarm

VFDPump2FaultAlarmCleared.Description: The fault cleared from the Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD).
VFDPump2FaultAlarmCleared.Message: Pump 2 Variable Frequency Drive (VFD) fault alarm cleared

WDS1SensorAlarm.Resolution: Check for leak or open circuit to water detection sensor 1.

WDS1SensorAlarmCleared.Description: Water no longer detected by sensor 1

WDS2SensorAlarm.Description: The presence of water is detected by sensor 2
WDS2SensorAlarm.Resolution: Check for leak or open circuit to water detection sensor 2.

WDS2SensorAlarmCleared.Description: Water no longer detected by sensor 2

WaterDetectionAlarm.Description: Two water detection sensors have detected a leak.
WaterDetectionAlarm.Message: Water Detection Alarm - 2 sensors detected water.
WaterDetectionAlarm.Resolution: Check CDU for coolant leak or condensation.

WaterDetectionAlarmCleared.Description: Water detection sensors no longer detect a leak.

Name: HPE CDU Alarms Message Registry
